name: Clin T Pancreas Other
title: Clinical T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Islets of Langerhans are distributed throughout the pancreas; an islet tumor is coded to the subsite of the pancreas in which the tumor arises if the information is available.

**Note 2:**  Islets of Langerhans are distributed throughout the pancreas. 
* An islet tumor is coded according to the subsite of the pancreas in which the tumor arises if the information is available

**Note 3:** Tumor size must be known to assign a value of T1 or T2. You may use a physicianâ€™s statement of the T category if this is the only information in the medical record.
* If the tumor appears to be in the T1 or T2 categories, but no size or category is specified, assign TX

**Note 4:**  Assign the appropriate T category (T1, T2) based on the tumor size for the following descriptions

    Confined to pancreas
    Localized, NOS

    Extension cannot be determined
